segments.text: Hello . I bought a China dress in your shop this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought it one size up by mistake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder if you can change it to one size down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course.Will you come with the receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll come to your place later in the evening , and how late is your shop open ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Until 8 o'clock , ma'am . We are looking forward to seeing you .
segments.speaker: S2
